articles.title: Trump Inauguration: Tech CEOs Get Choice Spots In Capitol Rotunda - Deadline
articles.description: With just minutes left in his presidency, Joe Biden issued a final batch of pardons: Members of his family. His pardons were yet another signal of his fear that allies will be targeted by incoming President Donald Trump. Those pardoned include brother James B…
